full_summary:
### Smart Building Program - Regional Standing Offer

#### Invitation to Tender

Defence Construction Canada (DCD) is seeking a contractor for the Smart Building Program - Regional Standing Offer in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Notice ID:** MP2016-79158

**Contractor Information**

*   Company Name: defence Construction Canada & / Construction de Défense Canada
*   Address: 350 Albert St,, 19th floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3 Canada

**Service Details**

The successful contractor will be required to provide various services on a "as and when required" basis to the Department of National Defence (DND) locations.

The following services are included:

*   Project Manager
*   Subject Matter Expert
*   Analyst
*   Integration Specialist
*   Total Classification Rate
*   Installation Services - Stand-Alone System
*   Installation Services - Centralized System
*   Deployment Services - Stand-Alone System
*   Reporting Services - Tier 1 Services per Building
*   Reporting Services - Tier 1 Services per Point
*   Reporting Services - Tier 2 Services per Building
*   Reporting Services - Tier 2 Services per Point
*   Reporting Services - Tier 3 Services
*   End of Term Services
*   Decommissioning Services

**Contract Information**

*   Estimated Maximum Contract Value: CAD 235,000.00
*   Contract Duration: 2 years from the date of establishment
*   Open-end.Contract value subject to issue by DND on "an as and when required" basis with a minimum value of$50,000.00 and maximum value of$100,000.00 per call-up.

**Commercial Information**

*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Brand Preference: Not Applicable
*   Unit of Measure: Hour, hour, 
 

**Submission Information**

Proposals must be submitted via the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time. All documents are available on MERX.

**Contact Information**

*   Full Name: Amanda Eid
*   Email: amanda.eid@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
*   Phone: 343-540-6713

Please visit the MERX website for the latest information on this tender and more.

Is this work morally questionable? A
